reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Tuutima? STET Model (Sustainability Through Eco-Tourism) is an innovative platform and co-creative solution for delivering high impacts / true development in developing countries through eco-tourism. The STET is created and founded for catalysing collabora tive activities to deliver new partnerships and improved livelihoods to poor and vulnerable communities in our partner countries and destinations. STET Model is established based on long-term research and development activities of STET Sustainable tourism concept together with global NGOs financing and consulting companies and tourism destinations around the World. Due the STET model the tourism or other ?root-business? opportunities have been identified and analyzed as a core and catalyst for development. Then the holistic development program is drafted to match the strategic and operational activities set up by the community members of the STT destination. In this proposed the STET pilot project in Gambia will be defined and needed operational and financia l resources secured. Due the piloting the scalable and sustainable business concept of STET will be refined and launched to be a Finnish Innovation for the sustainable development in developing and emerging countries. Representatives of the STET Team have visited The Gambia often and formed personal contacts with both the national regional and local government and administration. Tuutima? Sunrise has proposed a STET program for Sambuya destination to foster and facilitate mutually engaged development activi ties initiated contribute to the common goal of developing the bespoken sustainable Sambuya destination in The Gambia - to unite the destination and to provide livelihoods of the local communities through tourism.Key Elements of Sambuyan + STET Model ? Tuu tima? Eco-lodge (tourism facilities)? Skills Village (education + employment)? Sambuya Village Development ProgramThe Way Forward / 2017STET Model + Partnerships ? PPPs Land allocation Legalities STET Model / Program Plan ? Mutual understanding and commitm entsSecured resources ? STET Program Financing Operational support
